protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28780
text: Arabidopsis Col-0 plants were grown on peat pellet for 3 weeks under controlled conditions (21C, 16h light).
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28781
text: Total RNA was extracted from 50 to 100mg of tissues using Trizol. RNA samples were then purified using RNeasy mini kit.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28782
protocol.text: Two rosette leaves were treated with heat (40C), high light (1000uE) or wounding and meristems were sampled at 15 and 45min following stress treatment. Samples were also collected in parallel from plants that were exposed to control treatments corresponding to each stress.
